post.title: Welcome to Vtuber NewsDrop
post.content:
Drop ðŸ’§ get it?

The vision for newsdrop is to become a hub for VTuber News and Features with improved emphasis on local VTuber cultures in different regions of the world. We also showcase the latest in VTuber tech the community needs to know.

While others focus on talents from major agencies, we want to when possible show the spotlight on other VTuber groups and what impact they have in their communities.

Weekly Recap

A weekly list of relevant links and stories (the Weekly Recap) brings together updates from all sides of the community - the latest stories on talents, music, merchandise, events, research, and more.

Our Standards

  1. Do nothing our staff cannot defend.
  2. Cover, write and present every story with the care our staff would want if the story were about them.
  3. Assume there is at least one other side or version to every story.
  4. Assume the viewer is as smart and caring and good as our staff.
  5. Assume the same about all people on whom our staff reports.
  6. Assume personal lives are a private matter until a legitimate turn in the story absolutely mandates otherwise.
  7. Carefully separate opinion and analysis from straight news stories and clearly label everything.
  8. Do not use anonymous sources or blind quotes except on rare and monumental occasions. No one should be allowed to attack another anonymously.

Meet Our Writers

  • @vg_pidge
  • @JayAgonoy
  • @MontySeelana
